name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:

Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **PostgreSQL**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Redis**, and **AWS**, with strong expertise in CI/CD, automated quality assurance, and integration testing to ensure system reliability and reproducibility. 
Leveraging extensive experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms, integrating predictive analytics, and developing microservices and event-driven architectures. Adept in using cutting-edge technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **Django**, and MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to enhance application performance and scalability.
